name: Naive Riri
description:
Naïve Riri is a match 3 game. You need to go through many interesting levels, breaking power crystals and rescuing girls from Evil! Travel the worlds: visit a tavern, wake up in an alien cave, visit an elven forest! In each location, you need to break the crystals, collect them in combinations and collect a certain number of hearts in order to awaken the sleeping girl! Naïve Riri is an amazing adventure with beautiful music, lots of levels and anime style. In Naïve Riri - You may expect 26 quite difficult levels, passing which you will save the girls from the forces of Evil!



What can be found in the game:

Challenging and interesting levels

Deep and interesting story

Saving Riri from her sister

Diverse gameplay

Beautiful anime images

Incredible sound and visual effects



Naïve Riri - has a fun and addictive gameplay, beautiful music, anime style and girls who are waiting for you to rescue them! Have a good time in different worlds, along the way, saving people!
